content:
But if you're looking to furnish your space
and want to browse other Astralinks,
I'm planning to apply for a Station construction, so stay tuned~!

Before I knew it,
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, you've made quite a lovely life for yourself.

It's quite reassuring,
And quite admirable, indeed!
Though I haven't prepared any housewarming gift...

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>!
I heard the news,
You've built a new house!
